title: 【跑酷】UPSIDE DOWN PARKOUR|颠倒的跑酷|欢乐跑酷|SIRFISCHLING
author: Xiao_Tao_Zi
txt_content:
本帖最后由 像素君 于 2017-8-9 21:22 编辑 



简介 INFOThis is a map about jumping with different gravity than in normal Minecraft!It includes 5 Levels + 3 Bonus-Levels and also a gallery.You ask what the gallery is used for? Actually, it is used to teach you how the different Effect-Blocks work!Yeah, you heard right, there are different Effect-Blocks, too!So, what are you waiting for? If you ever wanted to jump upside-down in Minecraft, go ahead and play the map!PS: Also if you aren't a parkour-pro, there's no problem because the parkour is easy.
这是一张在正常minecraft关于不同重力的跑酷。有5关+3个附加关，还有一个陈列室。如果你想问陈列室是干什么的？那么，这是用来告诉你地的效果方块的原理！对！你猜对了，地图里有各种效果方块！所以，你还在等什么？如果你想要体验在minecraft里反着跳，那就去玩吧！PS：如果你是个跑酷渣，没关系，这个地图很简单！
作者：SIRFISCHLING地图版本：1.10.2地图大小：511kb
